mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getDeliveryCalendars */ SELECT a.delivery_seq 'deliverySeq', a.seller_id 'sellerId', a.yyyy_mm_dd 'yyyyMmDd', a.delivery_seq 'deliverySeq', a.address_postcode 'addressPostcode', a.address_state 'addressState', a.address_suburb 'addressSuburb', a.address_street 'addressStreet', a.address_note 'addressNote', a.is_pickup 'isPickup', b.user_name 'seller.userName', a.btwn_from_hhmm 'btwnFromHhmm', a.btwn_to_hhmm 'btwnToHhmm', a.use_yn 'useYn', a.create_datetime 'createDatetime', a.modify_datetime 'modifyDatetime', a.creator 'creator' FROM shop_delivery_calendar a LEFT OUTER JOIN cmm_user b ON b.user_id = a.seller_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.seller_id = #{sellerId} AND a.yyyy_mm_dd = #{yyyyMmDd} AND a.delivery_seq = #{deliverySeq} AND UPPER(a.is_pickup) = UPPER(#{isPickup}) AND a.address_postcode = #{addressPostcode} AND UPPER(a.address_state) = UPPER(#{addressState}) AND UPPER(a.address_suburb) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{addressSuburb}), '%') AND UPPER(a.address_street) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{addressStreet}), '%') AND UPPER(a.use_yn) = UPPER(#{useYn}) AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) AND str_to_date(#{searchDateFrom}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.yyyy_mm_dd, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{searchDateTo}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(a.yyyy_mm_dd, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY b.user_name ASC, a.yyyy_mm_dd ASC, a.btwn_from_hhmm ASC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}

/* QUERY ID : getTotalCntForProducts */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop_delivery_calendar a LEFT OUTER JOIN cmm_user b ON b.user_id = a.seller_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.seller_id = #{sellerId} AND a.yyyy_mm_dd = #{yyyyMmDd} AND a.delivery_seq = #{deliverySeq} AND UPPER(a.is_pickup) = UPPER(#{isPickup}) AND a.address_postcode = #{addressPostcode} AND UPPER(a.address_state) = UPPER(#{addressState}) AND UPPER(a.address_suburb) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{addressSuburb}), '%') AND UPPER(a.address_street) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{addressStreet}), '%') AND UPPER(a.use_yn) = UPPER(#{useYn}) AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) AND str_to_date(#{searchDateFrom}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.yyyy_mm_dd, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{searchDateTo}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(a.yyyy_mm_dd, '%Y-%m-%d')

/* QUERY ID : nextDeliverySeq */ SELECT CASE WHEN max(delivery_seq) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (max(delivery_seq) + 1) END FROM shop_delivery_calendar WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} AND yyyy_mm_dd = #{yyyyMmDd}
mapper.update: /* QUERY ID : modifyDeliveryCalendar */ UPDATE shop_delivery_calendar SET modify_datetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,btwn_from_hhmm = TRIM(TRIM(#{btwnFromHhmm})) ,btwn_to_hhmm = TRIM(TRIM(#{btwnToHhmm})) ,is_pickup = UPPER(TRIM(#{isPickup})) ,address_postcode = UPPER(TRIM(#{addressPostcode})) ,address_state = UPPER(TRIM(#{addressState})) ,address_suburb = UPPER(TRIM(#{addressSuburb})) ,address_street = UPPER(TRIM(#{addressStreet})) ,address_note = UPPER(TRIM(#{addressNote})) ,use_yn = UPPER(TRIM(#{useYn})) WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} AND yyyy_mm_dd = #{yyyyMmDd} AND delivery_seq = #{deliverySeq}
